mapper.select: SELECT RNO, BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, BDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, TO_CHAR(BDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BDATE FROM (SELECT BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, BDATE FROM MYCGV_BOARD ORDER BY BDATE DESC)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into mycgv_board(bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, bdate, bfile, bsfile) values('b_'||LTRIM(to_char(sequ_mycgv_board.nextval, '0000')) , #{btitle},#{bcontent},0,#{id},sysdate, #{bfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bsfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT BID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BHITS, ID, BDATE, BFILE, BSFILE FROM MYCGV_BOARD WHERE BID = #{bid}
mapper.update: update mycgv_board set bhits = bhits + 1 where bid = #{bid}
